divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking at the sky and i noticed it....i brought baby in the house we gotand we didnt go out my dad and then my mom went and got katrina...we stood thier and watched it as it was moving and it was rotating about 50 feet above some houses in our neighbor hood...we all just stared at it till it disappered and like faded out...the lights were like yellow orange and the thing and definite shape of the orangish yellow lights ..and that was triangular..me and my mom and my sister and dad as well as my best friend seen this object...
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around August 2nd 2011
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: me sis and mom and dad and my best friend all seen a triangular object with a yellowish orange light and it pulsated and made no sound at all
